SENT.plain: A 25-year-old patient and his sister had Marfan's syndrome and recurrent pressure neuropathy
Marfan's syndrome was inherited from their father while the neuropathy was inherited from their mother
Thus, the association of both disorders in the same patient was fortuitous
However it is suggested that the ligamentous hyperlaxity related to Marfan's syndrome may favour the occurrence of the neuropathy due to pressure
